title: how should i change an instruction to NOP in IDA?
content:
I am new with IDA assembler and i used to work with hopper app.
the problem is i can't change instruction in IDA from something like CBNZ to NOP.
is there any button to do this? i can't find anything on the internet and I have been searching for it all day.
I have tried many options from the edit menu.

answers_data.content:
NOTE: I'm assuming you're using IDA 7.X, although this should work equally well for 6.X versions. The option you're looking for is called 
Patch Program
. For your specific question, you'd do the following: Select the instruction you want to change Go to 
Edit -> Patch Program -> Assemble
Replace the instruction in the text box with the instruction you'd like it to be. Click OK The original instruction will now have been replaced with the new one. This article has more info and examples of using the other options in the 
Patch Program
submenu.
